PIC32CX-BZ Zigbee API Reference
Data Fields
ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t Struct Reference

This command is provided to allow updating of network configuration parameters or to request information from devices on network conditions in the local operating environment. The destination addressing on this primitive shall be unicast or broadcast to all devices for which macRxOnWhenIdle = TRUE. More...

ShortAddr_t nwkManagerAddr

Detailed Description

This command is provided to allow updating of network configuration parameters or to request information from devices on network conditions in the local operating environment. The destination addressing on this primitive shall be unicast or broadcast to all devices for which macRxOnWhenIdle = TRUE.

Definition at line 716 of file zdo.h.

Field Documentation

uint32_t ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t::scanChannels

The five most significant bits (b27,... b31) are reserved. The 27 least significant bits (b0, b1,... b26) indicate which channels are to be scanned (1 = scan, 0 = do not scan) for each of the 27 valid channels

Definition at line 721 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t::scanDuration

Possible values are:
ZDO_MGMT_ED_SCAN_DUR_0 (0x00) to ZDO_MGMT_ED_SCAN_DUR_5 (0x05) - request to perform an ED scan with duration depending exponentially on the parameter value;
ZDO_MGMT_CHANNEL_CHANGE (0xFE) - request to change the working channel to the one specified by the ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t::scanChannels bitmask;
ZDO_MGMT_NWK_PARAMS_CHANGE (0xFF) - request to change the device scanChannels and nwkManagerAddr values to those contained in the request.
Other values are invalid.

Definition at line 730 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t::scanCount

This field represents the number of energy scans to be conducted and reported. This field shall be present only if the ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t::scanDuration is within the range of 0x00 to 0x05.

Definition at line 738 of file zdo.h.

uint8_t ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t::nwkUpdateId

The value of the nwkUpdateId contained in this request. This value is set by the Network Channel Manager prior to sending the message. This field shall only be present if the ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t::scanDuration is 0xFE or 0xFF.

Definition at line 745 of file zdo.h.

ShortAddr_t ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t::nwkManagerAddr

This field shall be present only if the ZDO_MgmtNwkUpdateReq_t::scanDuration is set to 0xFF, and, if present, indicates the NWK address for the device with the Network Manager bit set in its Node Descriptor.

Definition at line 750 of file zdo.h.
